title: 3. Second Largest Number
question:
There is an array of positive integers of size N, and all you have to do is 
find and print the second largest number from the array!
input: You are provided the input in the following manner:

-The first Line contains "N" the size of the array!
-The next line contains the array containing N integers! 

NOTE:There can be duplicates in the array!
output: The output should contain the second largest Integer printed!
explanation:
In the given array, 8 is the largest and 6 is the second 
largest number, hence we print 6!
